website_summaries.verdict: An affordable brow gel that works surprisingly well for a low-cost brand. Has earned many happy customers for the natural results it delivers at a low price point.
pros: Repeat users brag about the long-wearing formula and natural colors
Gel is easy to apply, and feels lightweight
Fills in sparse brows without looking fake or heavy
Most users say it's easy to find a matching color
cons: If you prefer dark or bold brow color, it may not work for you
Some consumers received tubes with gel that was dried up on arrival

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Nice, natural looking. I'd say it's a little or the darker side of medium brown. Applicator is great, let's you get a finer point at the ends of the browser. Comes off easily, doesn't stain skin at all. Lasts me a few months with 5-6 days/week use. I was using Queen of the Fill before this, and thus is just as good, but 1/3 the price.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again
customer_reviews.text: Solid product. I have sparse, wirey eyebrows that drive me crazy. This stuff holds them in shape all day (and not bad for overnight wear) without looking too unnatural. More transfer resistant than my last stuff - which I appreciate. It seems like it takes a lot of strokes for me to get the results I need - which may mean I run out faster. Still, for the price, I can’t complain.
customer_reviews.author: mojo jojo

customer_reviews.title: More natural; control over shape
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product and the color. I purchased the blonde first bc I didn’t want it too dark, but it ended up not being dark enough so I bought the next shade darker. I did a light coat this am. Yesterday I applied heavier and they were darker and bigger, so you do have control over that. It doesn’t fill in the bare spots I have like a pencil, but it also looks more natural than a pencil!! Overall I really like and would purchase again
customer_reviews.author: Megan Goode

customer_reviews.title: Be careful when selecting colors - BUYER BEWARE!
customer_reviews.text: I got the brunette color, as I'm a brunette, but did not expect to get a taupe color. There's really no way to tell what the color is until you get it in the mail. The description of the colors does not match up with the description of what is being sold. Be careful -- you may not like the color that you get. Ask them to change their image on the page to show us what each of the colors look like, from brunette, to espresso and I think there's a chocolate. I have no idea which would match and which wouldn't, but the brunette is a light taupe. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: RLD

customer_reviews.title: Best.Ever.
customer_reviews.text: I'm approaching 60 (!) and my eyebrows have thinned and faded. I'm a brunette with hazel eyes and medium light skin. The blonde does it for me, but I also have the brunette for when I am going out at night. Too dark for day, perfect for night. At this price, why not?
customer_reviews.author: Joanna

customer_reviews.title: Favorite brow tool
customer_reviews.text: I haven't graduated to semi permanent and I like how this is subtle thickener and filler for my brows. It's more forgiving and natural looking. Not waterproof of course but good for what I like.
customer_reviews.author: Ahn

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and looks good on.
customer_reviews.text: I like this eyebrow tint? a lot. I’m not great at doing makeup much less eyebrows but I think the results are decent IMO. :) If I mess up, I just take a q-tip with a bit of saliva and it comes right off. Easy to use and the price is right. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Nena

customer_reviews.title: Not dark brown
customer_reviews.text: This is a light brown color. If you are looking for natural dark brown, brunette eyebrows, this is not it. Do not buy
customer_reviews.author: Khady FALL

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: We're going to ignore the fact that my eyelash is falling off 😂😩 I took this picture after being out in the heat all day. I usually stick to ABH pomade but since growing my eyebrows out, I wanted to find something that looked more natural looking. I LOVE this stuff. It lasts, it's easy to apply, it saves me about 20 minutes on my eyebrows, and the color is perfect. I ordered this in the shade brunette. The only thing is I wouldn't reccomend this product for anyone that doesn't have enough hair on their eyebrows, as I don't see it working well for them since it is so light
customer_reviews.author: NB

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the $5
customer_reviews.text: I purchased brunette, which is more like a light brown. There wasn’t enough product in the brand new tube to coat my brows. Basically a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Great product but too light
customer_reviews.text: I was happy to see a NYX eyebrow gel for such a great price. My old one (different brand) had given out and I was on the hunt for another one in a chocolate brown color. After reading the reviews, decided to go with the "brunette" shade. Wow, I was way off. I am a brunette but when I received this, was a little surprised to see it's more of an ash blonde. Tried it and loved the applicator brush and the formula so gave it to my daughter who its perfect for. Immediately ordered this again 2 shades darker- in "espresso". I hope this is closer to what I'm looking for!
customer_reviews.author: JoyNicole

customer_reviews.title: This is the one you really want to buy!!!! Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I'm not waiting for them to ask for a review. I really love this brow gel. I've used another one from Amazon Choice but it's expensive and doesn't last very long. Kind of clumpy too. But NYX really goes on smooth and color match is not too dark. I'm a grey/blonde but eyebrows and thinning and brown with lots of white coming through. They look really good after applying NYX. The other product I was using smeared on my skin and made my brows look too painted. This is perfect. The gel arrived yesterday, I tried it today and ordered 3 more just now!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie S.from Taylorsville

customer_reviews.title: What a deal!
customer_reviews.text: I make a lot of purchases but I don't often write reviews. I was looking for a way to enhance my brows. Since I don't have much experience with this type of product, I didn't want to make a big investment. I have to admit that I was skeptical of this brow mascara because of the low price... but it's exactly what I needed! The color is perfect (I'm dark blonde) and it's so easy (for even a novice) to use.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Mailey

customer_reviews.title: Tinted brow mascara is easy to use
customer_reviews.text: The product does what it's supposed to do for those of us whose brows no longer have natural color. The brush is small which helps a lot but a smaller brush would be even better. When using the product it's good to remember to first wipe the excess color off of the brush. Oh yes, if it's too light initially, more coats build color.
customer_reviews.author: FergieP

customer_reviews.title: Definitely don't buy
customer_reviews.text: This does not work well unless you want your eyebrows to look fake. I just recently stopped tweezing my eyebrows and let them grow I'm again thicker, but from so many years of tweezing it's left a line in one brow I can't seem to grow hair in, and at the start of that brow a bald spot, so I wanted to try a filler instead of combing them to cover and using a brow pencil or dying them. This just made my brows look super fake and it smeared easily
customer_reviews.author: Tambee

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting and goes on well
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't too sure if this would be a good product because it is so inexpensive, but it goes on really well and lasts all day long. It is also buildable if you want it to be darker or help fill in your brows a bit more. I tend to use it more to tint my natural brows rather than do a lot of filling it and the applicator allows me to do that without globbing on a bunch of product like other brands I've used before. I will definitely be repurchasing this and am looking forward to trying other NYX products.
customer_reviews.author: Spike

customer_reviews.title: Too red toned, bad application
customer_reviews.text: Not the color I was expecting. I have black brows but fill them in with a slightly lighter ashy brown powder. I got this in Brunette and I was hoping this would be more of an ashy tone but its actually really red toned; not cute. Plus applying it was a challenge. The brush was so large and glopped way too much product on to my eyebrows and just sort of made them look gross and weird. Its too bad, I was hoping this would be a faster way to do my brows on my lazy days. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: iWearBlack

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I usually use the essence brow gel from Ulta, and I still like that one better than this one. This brow gel is nice, though. It keeps the brows in place. I have dark brown hair, and I knew the espresso would be too dark for me. When I got the tube, I thought the color was too light in chocolate, but it worked really well. I would get this one again, if I had to, but not over the essence one. This one does a good job at what it’s supposed to do though.
customer_reviews.author: c.costa

customer_reviews.title: easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I have tried several products to deal with boingy, white aging brows. This has been the easiest to use...not too dark so more "natural" looking. Some gray and white shows through sometimes. I do not have much trouble with smearing when applying and no smearing at all once I have used it. Lasts pretty well throughout the day, too. Just a bit more setting power would be nice, but this is fine.
customer_reviews.author: sallly

customer_reviews.title: gave me the perfect natural looking brows!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve never been one to spend a lot of time on my brows, I do the absolute bare minimum to keep them looking tamed and put together. I was nervous to try this because I didn’t want them to look too dark or unnatural. I have darker hair, but not super dark brows so I just wanted a good brown and this is it. I went 2 shades up from what I originally thought based on reviews and it’s perfect! you won’t anything cheaper that works this good! a little goes a long way also.
customer_reviews.author: Loren bohanan

customer_reviews.title: Lasts all day but lighter than expected
customer_reviews.text: Really nice in that it lasts all day. However, Brunette is lighter than I expected! Not so light that it looks bad, I'd just have preferred something a bit darker. I will say that it could be because I'm an albino with clearish-white eyebrows (I dyed my hair dark brown, which means I have to fill in my brows), so there's no background brown in the hairs to help the gel out in the color department.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sooooooooo disappointing.
customer_reviews.text: Could not use because it was to dry. Could hardly pull the brush out. Very disappointing😣😣😣😣 .
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Works well with practice
customer_reviews.text: Took a few tries to get it right. It can get very dark on the skin and smear if you don’t just lightly touch the brow hairs. I shouldn’t have listened to the reviewers who said the blonde is so light you can hardly see it and to order the brunette. I should have ordered the blonde. The brunette is a little too dark for me. You can always go over it to darken but can’t lighten a color. Other than the color issue it is a quality product. Holds the stray hairs in place without feeling greasy and has a nice size applicator brush.
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Great product, bad packaging
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, easy and no fuss to apply, makes my brows look fuller without looking like I'm wearing makeup. My only complaint is that the caps keep cracking. I've bought three of these now (two from Sephora) and every time the lid cracks and the product gets dried out. Frustrating, since it happens when there's tons of product left and I have to toss it. Hoping the one I just bought will last longer, going to try and really baby it (not that I overtightened the other ones).
customer_reviews.author: Sasha

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I bought thia bc of the same wand and it looked like the same product as the Glossier Boy Brow just cheaper and I am overly surprised how amazing this product is. Would highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Refund request, product dried up and useless
customer_reviews.text: Awful, opened up the package this AM and it was all dried up. Request a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is a joke , a failure I do not recommend to buy, trash out .
customer_reviews.text: It is a joke X totally disappointed for NYX s failure to produce a quality brow mascara . It took forever reapplication for color to come out of the tube , dry formula , barely deliver any result does not condition at all .
customer_reviews.author: Maika

customer_reviews.title: What I had been looking for!
customer_reviews.text: I have olive skin but it's kind of light and I have highlights, so the problem I've had is finding the right shade of brown -- not too light so that my lashes don't look washed out or too dark where my features look hard, and not a kind of brown that looks red against my skin. I've tried different products over the years: pencils, gels with a brush (like this one) and powders you apply with a brush. This product is the perfect kind of brown and it STAYS on all day long! It's easy to apply and I absolutely love it
customer_reviews.author: anathesupermom

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I have a very sparse eyebrow due to over plucking. This product makes my eyebrow appear thicker and keeps the brows in place. You can apply it lightly for natural looking brows and apply a bit thicker if you want your brows to appear darker. I will continue to use this product. All NYX products are really super.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna

customer_reviews.title: Trying something new with my brows--LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: If you are a bare minimum, clueless when it comes to makeup girl like me, you'll love this! I knew I needed to start doing SOMETHING to my eyebrows, but was overwhelmed at the thought of learning how to do something new. However, this is SO EASY to put on (literally just a mascara brush and you don't need much) and looks fantastic. It was an instant transformation and only took a few minutes. LOVE LOVE LOVE!!
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Great for adding that finishing touch
customer_reviews.text: I already have decent brows but have a few sparse areas that can use some touching up. This is perfect for that and also adding a bit of that fullness effect. Even though it doesn’t state water resistant I find it does last very well, even through a nap or some perspiration!
customer_reviews.author: elle

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: Before and after pics! Easy to apply and a nice finish. Makes my brows look fuller and more defined. I love the brow brush. This is a nice cheap product that does the job!
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Favorite eyebrow filler!
customer_reviews.text: It looks good, isn't too thick or sticky, and stays all day. I love it!! Really excited about this affordable find!
customer_reviews.author: Aubrey Potter

customer_reviews.title: Dried out!
customer_reviews.text: It was dried out and completely unable to be used.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: My eyebrows have begun to sport some white ones. I plucked the first ones, but can't do that forever, so decided to try this. It covers well and looks natural. Once it dries, it doesn't smudge. If I put my glasses on too soon, I end up with a smudge mess, but if I wait 5 minutes or so, all is well.
customer_reviews.author: Diane M. Greiwe

customer_reviews.title: Ehhh color cool ability to control none
customer_reviews.text: This is not a tint. This is a weird hard gel that goes on your brows. It does darken them, but since you have no control to shape them it just looks like a dark mess on your face. It’s cheap to use but doesn’t stay one if you touch your eye brow at all. I’d recommend spending more on a waterproof pencil an learning to do your brows. Good luck!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't keep eyebrows in place very well
customer_reviews.text: This does a good job of tinting your eyebrows but it does not hold them in place. That's what I was really wanting because I have a couple out of control eyebrows. But it does go on and come off quite easily. And is easy to use the brushes small so you can manage it without mistakes.
customer_reviews.author: _anie

customer_reviews.title: Really liked this
customer_reviews.text: This was the first time I’ve tried this brand. It held my eyebrow hairs nicely in place without feeling like they were glued down. I ordered the brunette one and it was a little light for me as I have dark brown hair.
customer_reviews.author: toddlermommy

customer_reviews.title: It comes dry and empty!
customer_reviews.text: There was nothing inside. It is better to spend a little more and get the ones that last for 6 months!
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Great product and great price
customer_reviews.text: This was a great purchase, the application is easy and the spooley brush is nice and small for accuracy. Will buy again... I have dark dark blonde hot and the light brown color was great.
customer_reviews.author: Castrejon

customer_reviews.title: Practically dried up
customer_reviews.text: Not enough product comes out. If it’s a new tube, it shouldn’t be this dry.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon User

customer_reviews.title: Boy brow *almost* dupe
customer_reviews.text: I'm a Glossier boy brow junkie. Nothing has satisfied me since trying it. Until this brow mascara. I just swiped it on to see if I just wasted 3 bucks. Y'all. If you're looking for a boy brow dupe this is the closest thing I've found. It's simple. Pigmented. Inexpensive. Perfect. I'm not going back to glossier. This is a new fave. I just wish the spoolie was a tad smaller.
customer_reviews.author: Butler S.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product, great price and super easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I just received my order for 2 of these brow mascara/brushes for your brows. I’m really happy with them! They don’t get all gunked-up on the brush and there’s not alot of ‘excess’ that you have to deal with. It took me just a couple of swipes to get the amount I needed. The price was $4.50 each; a great price for an excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Boudrot

customer_reviews.title: Covers the Grey
customer_reviews.text: I bought brunette, it covers very nicely, covers the very few grey hairs I have in each brow. I also really light the longer brush with this product. FABULOUS price too - I'll keep and use this one and will reorder when the time comes. I highly recommend this brow product
customer_reviews.author: Susan C

customer_reviews.title: Bought two colors and love them both - Blonde and Light Brown to match my Blonde hair
customer_reviews.text: I am a natural blonde with a "dirty blonde" under color. I recently even added some brown to the top. I caught the blonde and the light brown and love them both. I wear the blonde full on, just around the house (my brows are so blonde you cannot see them, especially near the ends). I love the way it looks like I have no makeup on. The darker one is more "in style" with brows being worn darker and thicker, so I will likely buy that one again to wear out. They both look great and seem like a good purchase for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Buysse

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy this product. I am a redhead and my eyebrows are blonde, I use an eyebrow pencil and then will go over it with this gel. It makes my eyebrow look brown because I use the brunette color. I don't let it touch my skin because I just want to add color to the hairs since I already fill them in. Will be buying this again.
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: Quick easy natural Brow color
customer_reviews.text: I really like this for adding color to my brows. I wipe the wand off a bit just like I do with my mascara wands. It’s easy to brush on and dries right away. Great color I’m a medium brunette with highlights and this looks very natural as long as I don’t over apply. Lasts a couple a months and I use it twice a day most days.
customer_reviews.author: S. Andreas

customer_reviews.title: Great dupe for boy brow
customer_reviews.text: This is a great/cheaper alternative to boy brow or gimme brow! The spoolie is pretty big (or I guess the standard mascara size) but other than that the product and final result are totally comparable to those higher end brands.
customer_reviews.author: Mia

customer_reviews.title: Awesome buy
customer_reviews.text: This works exactly how you would expect and much more. Don't let the price scare you -for real . Really fills out my eyebrows and they look so much thicker. Would def recommend and buy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Natural and fuller appearance with this product!
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this product. Easy to use and stays on all day! Looks very natural. My eyebrows are sparse but this really makes them appear fuller and more natural than the pencil I used prior.
customer_reviews.author: Christine M

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: Holy moley, this stuff actually works! I am super skeptical of most women’s beauty products (you should be too). But this one actually works without looking clumpy or unnatural. It’s an easy, natural-looking way to enhance your beauty. Would recommend. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: #1 item in my makeup drawer
customer_reviews.text: This is my must-have makeup item...like, if I had to just take one item, it would be a tie between this and tinted Chapstick. It's so easy and makes such a huge difference. The color looks light, but it's just right with my dark brown hair.
customer_reviews.author: RJO

customer_reviews.title: Empty container!
customer_reviews.text: WASTE OF MONEY! There are maybe a few drops of product in this container. With it being brand new, I thought maybe I just needed to swivel the wand around to get some product out. Wrong. There is literally not even enough in the container for the very first application. Horrible!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Bath

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: It is perfect. This is the first time I've bought a brow wand and I totally lucked out with this. Goes on easily, not clumpy, looks natural, and when it dries it stays ON. Great price for a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Emkay

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. My brows are sparse in the front and very blonde. This adds just the right amount of color and volume without looking overdone.
customer_reviews.author: D K

customer_reviews.title: This is the best one I have used!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best one I have used and WILL be buying again when I need it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product but packaging is not good
customer_reviews.text: I liked it because the product itself was pretty good but the packaging is not that good. I’ve barely had it for like 2 months and it broke. There was product inside still but it completely dried out because there was no way to close it.
customer_reviews.author: Beatriz Ponce

customer_reviews.title: Turn back time!
customer_reviews.text: Really helps with darkening & making my eyebrows appear fuller as they start to thin and fade with age.
customer_reviews.author: SulliRam67

customer_reviews.title: I’m impressed!
customer_reviews.text: I usually use dipbrow but I realized if you already have eyebrow hair, pencils and things like this are better if trying to get natural look. This works better than the benefit eyebrow mascara and for half the price! I highly recommend this !
customer_reviews.author: Julian R.

customer_reviews.title: Buy this for full brows!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product! I've tried Glossier's boy brow and didn't get the full brow effect I was hoping for. This does that at a fraction of the price! I don't use it everyday but I've had it since March and am just now purchasing another tube, so it lasts a pretty long time!
customer_reviews.author: Emily J.

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: I really like this brow gel. Holds everything in place and adds some tint. I did order one shade too light the first try, but happy with my second try.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha

customer_reviews.title: Works alright for the price
customer_reviews.text: This brow product is fine, but nothing to write home about. My husband uses it and it provides a natural finish on his light eyebrows. It doesn't show up well on my brown eyebrows, so it doesn't do much for me.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin C.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product
customer_reviews.text: I have eyebrows again! This stuff is great, it's my favorite eyebrow product to date (and that includes some expensive brands). Good coverage, easy to use, staying power, and the brush separates three hairs nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Tera Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Good quality product
customer_reviews.text: I really like this brow mascara. I use it to cover my gray hair in between hair coloring. It helps to keep my hair looking youthful until the next dye job.
customer_reviews.author: M. River

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: The color is great for blondes and the price is super affordable. I have purchased MAC and Sephora brand brow mascaras before this and I won't ever over pay again. I completely recommend NYX brow mascara.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: I don’t have sensitive skin and my eyes became swollen
customer_reviews.text: GAVE ME AN ALLERGIC REACTION MADE IN UNSANITARY CONDITIONS IN TAIWAN
customer_reviews.author: ConyBunny

customer_reviews.title: Replacing My $20 Brow Tint!
customer_reviews.text: I have been purchasing European Wax's tinted brow builder for over a year. I decided to try this given the huge price difference. I was very surprised to find this product is of very similar quality and provides me with the same look. I don't plan on purchasing my expensive brow tint anymore!
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite brow gel! Goes on easily and lasts through the work day! Will continue to buy!! Already purchased 4 times!!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Juran

customer_reviews.title: It’s okay. Gets job done.
customer_reviews.text: This is... okay. I wish Maybelline wouldn’t have stopped making their brow stuff like this bc theirs was a lot better. But it gets the job done and it’s really cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Newell

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorite products
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, color matches perfectly, has lasted me over a month worth of use. One of the most affordable and good quality brow products I’ve used.
customer_reviews.author: Kohai

customer_reviews.title: If a microblading expert recommends it...
customer_reviews.text: .. then you gotta know it'll be good! There are TONS of wayyyyy more expensive versions of this, but I LOVE THIS! They have gained a customer for life!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Hull

customer_reviews.title: Came dried up and unusable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this once and it was pretty good. Second time it came dried out and useless. Wouldn't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Nameless

customer_reviews.title: Very useful for coloring your brows
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price, especially during a pandemic when your stylist can’t dye your brows in the shop. Definitely does a nice job.
customer_reviews.author: Annandale

customer_reviews.title: Alright !
customer_reviews.text: I got the wrong shade and it’s a little to light , but it has a decent hold and looks nice anyway. Perfect for “no makeup . Makeup “ brows , or a quick brow
customer_reviews.author: Jerali Mendoza

customer_reviews.title: Better than the expensive ones!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using eyebrow gel/mascara for years and paying anywhere from $12-$25+ a tube. This product works just as well, if not better, and is a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Smith

customer_reviews.title: Just got today
customer_reviews.text: Looks very nice on and covers those white eyebrow hairs. Small tube...hope it lasts a long time!
customer_reviews.author: Dusty

customer_reviews.title: Fiance dissappointed
customer_reviews.text: My fiance was happy when she got this,and then she was disappointed. She said it wasn't dark like it was supposed to be,and she expected it to be bigger.She said it was more like a sample size.
customer_reviews.author: Clint Melton

customer_reviews.title: Best Natural Looking Eyebrows
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff! Best eyebrows ever. I wanted a natural looking product and this delivers. It's easy to use, forgiving if you make a mistake, and looks fantastic. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Anna M. Duarte

customer_reviews.title: Love this !
customer_reviews.text: For a person who naturally a nice shape and full eyebrows, I don’t really feel the need to do much with my eyebrows. This Just helps me keep my brows in place while adding a light tint
customer_reviews.author: Cassie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This brow gel is absolutely perfect! It goes on lightly and does not get "clumpy" at all. And it is VERY reasonably priced! I will definitely be buying this again!
customer_reviews.author: K. Sanders

customer_reviews.title: fresh  & not past the expiration date
customer_reviews.text: I received it yesterday, I went to use it &it was all dried up. Like it was old or experied.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Frankovich

customer_reviews.title: Account was hacked before a Hannah send a partial list of what was shipped
customer_reviews.text: Purchased two dif brands of eyebrow Make up don’t work PS received delivery today came w 4 gift cards The huge mess that was shipped is ready for you to have it picked up It came w 13 gift cards Marcia Bronson 4807662599 Marciabronson1 @Gmail. Com
customer_reviews.author: Marcia

customer_reviews.title: Great product glad I bought it
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy I got this I have blonde hair but dyed it darker and my eyebrows are very light blond using this makes my hair color look natural because now my eyebrows match
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie b.

customer_reviews.title: First one was perfect. The next two were dried out and unusable.
customer_reviews.text: The first one I purchased was great. Natural color, easy application and lasted quite a few months without drying out. The two which I purchased recently were both so dry that I could not get the product onto the wand. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanna

customer_reviews.title: Finally an affordable gel
customer_reviews.text: Great value compared to high end brow gels. Provides just enough to fill in sparse areas. Happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jazzy Jade

customer_reviews.title: Good Stuff
customer_reviews.text: Works great and price is just right. Best eyebrow mascara I have tried; and I have tried a ton of them at all price ranges.
customer_reviews.author: arcanamundi

customer_reviews.title: Not to dramatic-love it!
customer_reviews.text: I have very sparse eyebrows. I ordered the brunette. As you can see in pic the difference in both eyebrows. It made a huge difference and not to dramatic. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Huskymama13

customer_reviews.title: The tube completely broke
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this product in the past and I LOVE this product. I was loving this tube of product just the same UNTIL the entire tube completely broke. The weird part is that the tube broke beneath the thread for the lid so I couldn’t even just find a replacement wand. If you look at the pictures you can see where it broke. It was very weird and odd! The worst part is that there was a ton of good product still in the tube that had to get thrown away 😭
customer_reviews.author: Leah Calder

customer_reviews.title: As Advertised
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Stays on all day, even with my more oily skin. Looks natural. Comes off easily with my oil-based makeup remover.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy the quality and color of this product. It doesn't smear and looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Settingapenname

customer_reviews.title: Great for natural looking eyebrows
customer_reviews.text: I probably should have gotten a darker color but other than that and the fact that it smells like feet and rubbing alcohol it works really good and makes my eyebrows look awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Deena

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I like make up! but simple make up i don't like to spend one hour contouring and all that extra stuff so this eyebrow brush was perfect for me ;)
customer_reviews.author: DTorres

customer_reviews.title: Great brow mascara for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite brow mascara. Very natural looking. I let it set for a few seconds and very gently press a dry blending sponge to the brows to remove any excess product.
customer_reviews.author: Jen K

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: My favorite eyebrow product! I brush it lightly on my eyebrows just to darken the hairs that are already there, so it’s not super dark or super muddy looking. It looks so natural and keeps the brows in place!
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Love nyx
customer_reviews.text: Nyx has got to be my favorite makeup. Always amazing value for the money for great product and the same is true for this particular product. Love it. Easy to use and nice natural look.
customer_reviews.author: Becca R

customer_reviews.title: Not impressive
customer_reviews.text: I don't like the brush. Maybelline brush is better and easier to use.
customer_reviews.author: LillyLulla

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: This eyebrow gel is amazing. It takes less than three minutes to do my eyebrows and they look amazing. You can’t tell that my eyebrows aren’t naturally so full and dark. It’s like applying mascara to your eyebrows, except it isn’t stiff. Long lasting wear and definitely worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron Coffey

customer_reviews.title: The color is off
customer_reviews.text: This was called brunette but it was very light. More for blonde hair I would say and a strange shade of brunette. I would get a darker one if you have brunette hair.
customer_reviews.author: maureen

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and great!
customer_reviews.text: Very affordable and works amazingly, I never use eyebrow tint gel, but I just started and this amazing! The color is perfect. It’s totally worth it
customer_reviews.author: Misara

customer_reviews.title: love this! have tried more expensive versions as well ...
customer_reviews.text: love this! have tried more expensive versions as well as eyebrow powders and pencils, but this in the end is my favorite of all of the options. So easy and quick to put on in the morning and a nice subtle-looking brown that doesn't look garish. Great everyday product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: NYX PROFESSIONAL MAKEUP Tinted Brow Mascara, Brunette
product_meta.description: Color:Brunette| Size:0.22 Fl OzNo shame in wishing for a strong beautiful brow! Our foolproof tinted brow mascara helps your dream come true. It sets, tames and tints brows for natural-looking wear. Our dependable formula leaves brows feeling soft while maintaining complete control. Ingredients: Water/Aqua/Eau, Acrylates/Octylacrylamide Copolymer, Beeswax/Cera Alba/Cire d'Abeille, Butylene Glycol, VP/Hexadecene Copolymer, Glyceryl Stearate, Cetearyl Alcohol, Euphorbia Cerifera (Candelilla) Wax/ Candelilla Cera/ Cire de Candelilla, Stearic Acid, Magnesium Aluminum Silicate, Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax/ Copernicia Cerifera Cera/ Cire de Carnauba, Aminomethyl Propanol, Mineral Oil/ Paraffinum Liquidum/ Huile Minérale, Caprylyl Glycol, Acrylates/C10-30Alky Acrylate Crosspolymer, Phenoxyethanol. MAY CONTAIN/ PEUT CONTENIR (+/-): Mica, Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491, 77492, 77499).
feature_bullets: TINTED BROW MASCARA: Tame, tint, fill and set eyebrows in one step with our Tinted Brow Mascara. This foolproof brow building mascara formula covers your major brow concerns while keeping your arches soft and smooth.
COMB INTO BROWS: This tinted brow mascara adds depth without residue or hardening brows. Use alone or apply over brow powder or eyebrow pencil to set brows in place and add a slight tint of color.

FILL IN, SHAPE & SET: Building beautiful eyebrows is easier than ever with our full line of NYX Professional Makeup eyebrow products including brow setters & primers, eyebrow pomade pencils, brow gels, primers & powders!
CRUELTY FREE COSMETICS: We believe animals belong in our arms—not in a lab. All of our makeup is PETA certified cruelty-free. We don't test any of our products on animals.

DISCOVER NYX PROFESSIONAL MAKEUP: Try all our pro makeup & beauty products, from eyeshadow palette, liquid eyeliner & eyeliner pencils, mascara & false lashes to lipstick, lip gloss, foundation, primer, blush, bronzer, highlighters, brushes & more!

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
